name: word-to-pdf
title: Word to PDF Converter
description: Convert Microsoft Word documents (DOCX/DOC) to PDF format
content:
Overview

This application converts Microsoft Word documents (.docx and .doc files) into PDF format. Built using docx2pdf, it preserves all formatting, styles, and layouts from the original document.

Features

  • Convert DOCX and DOC files to PDF
  • Preserves all formatting and styles
  • Maintains document layout and structure
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload your Word document (.docx or .doc) from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the PDF output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as your input file (e.g., document.docx becomes document.pdf). The PDF maintains all formatting, fonts, and layouts from the original Word document.

Use Cases

  • Converting Word documents for universal viewing
  • Creating print-ready PDFs from Word files
  • Archiving documents in PDF format
  • Sharing documents with users who don't have Word
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/word_to_pdf.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
